page.title: 11A Gretna Teenager
page.content: {Nicola McCartney}is a second year pupil at{Annan Academy.}She travels to and from school by{bus}each day.She reckons school takes up most of her time but that there is still plenty to do outside school.There are numerous clubs to join,for example badminton,and there is a disco most Saturday nights in the Community Centre.On a Wednesday night Nicola goes to "{Helping Hands}",a type of youth club for girls.The{club}is run by{Miss Haining}who takes the girls{ {swimming,ice skating and on outings.}} {Nicola}works part-time in a local hotel kitchen three nights per week for three hours.She likes living in Gretna but thinks there should be more activites provided for people in her age group.Even so she states she would not like to live anywhere else.
